Posts.Content: Hi you say you are prone to cysts and doctor gave you antibiotics . I would try not worry my neice had a lump and it ended up a cyst she is also prone to cysts. When I went to doc he was quite concerned with my lump which is to the outer upper right breast going into the armpit I was at consultant the following week.. don't Google it will have you thinking the worst. If you feel it's too much call the doctor get a earlier appointment. Or speak with them Stay Â positive most lumps are ok..
Posts.Title: Really worried !! Breast lump with indentation :-(
